column4: every time I mention virus scanners and ubuntu in the same sentence, someone tries to wash my mouth out with soap... :)
oh, how can I make a .mid file play in mplayer?
I use clamav to protect users from themselves.  I don't need the protection on our linux/bsd machines, but a lot of our users need plenty of protection from themselves.
